Notes: Construction of a third and fourth floor over existing mixed used building to include a rear extension at first and second floor level and change of use of the ground floor existing A1 units (x2) and A3 unit (x1) at No 5-7 into 2 retail units (Use class A1) and the existing flats and upper floors at No 5-7 and No 9 into a total of 13 self-contained flats (6x1bed, 4x2bed and 3x3bed) with associated terraces, alterations to existing entrances, cycle parking and landscaping

Demolition of Nos 633 and 635 Harrow Road and detached double garage and erection of a new three storey block providing 8 self-contained flats (1 x 1bed, 5 x 2bed and 2 x 3bed) whilst retaining existing vehicular crossovers from Harrow Road and Dalmeny Close, provision for car, cycle and bike parking, bin stores and landscaping

Change of use of the 1st, 2nd and part of the ground floor of the public house (Use class A4) to create 9 self-contained flats (2 x 1bed, 3 x 2bed, 2 x 3bed and 2 x 4bed), together with associated alterations to include erection of a partial third floor, new 2nd floor rear extension, replacement and relocation of some of the windows, insertion of new windows and rooflights, terraces and screening and bin stores  and subject to a Deed of Agreement dated 21 July 2017 under Section 106 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended

Demolition of existing dwellinghouse and erection of a part three part four storey building comprising 39 self-contained flats (27 X 1bed, 8 x 2bed and 4 x 3bed) with associated basement car and cycle parking spaces accessed via new crossover off Rushout Avenue, bin stores, fencing and landscaping, subject to a Deed of Agreement dated 15 May 2018 under Section 106 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended.

Demolition of bungalow and erection of a part two, part three and part four storey building with top floor set back, comprising 8 self-contained flats (3 x studio, 3 x 1 bed and 2 x 2 bed), provision for 5 car parking spaces to rear, refuse and bicycle storage to front, communal and private amenity spaces and associated landscaping (revised description)
Demolition of existing garages, alterations to remaining building and erection of a two-storey building comprising seven dwellings

SiteNameAddress: Flats 1-12 Inc And Flats 13-24 Inc, Leeland Way, NW10 1SA
OwnershipStatus: mixed ownership
Notes: Extensions at roof level extensions over two detached blocks of flats to form a third floor comprising of six new residential flats (4 x 2bed and 2 x1bed) with associated balconies to the front elevation, bin stores and use of exisiting garages to provide 6 car parking spaces

SiteNameAddress: Garages Rear Of Glenmore Parade, Ealing Road, HA0
Notes: Demolition of existing garages adjoining Glenmore Parade shops and erection of a 4 storey mixed-use block  and 5 self-contained flats (4 x 2bed and 1 x 3bed) on the upper floors, with associated landscaping and installation of new vehicular and pedestrian access gate

OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
Notes: Rear dormer windows, 4 front rooflights and conversion of the upper floors at 52A & 54A into 5 self-contained flats (1 x 3 bed, 2 x 2bed, 1 x 1bed and 1 x studio) with provision for cycle parking and bin stores to the rear  and subject to a Deed of Agreement dated 23 February 2017 under Section 106 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended

SiteNameAddress: Land Rear Of 25 To 30, Stonebridge Park, NW10
OwnershipStatus: mixed ownership
Notes: Development to provide 2 x 2 bedroom houses and 3 x 3 bedroom houses, with car parking, cycle storage, refuse storage, amenity space and landscaping

SiteNameAddress: Northfield Industrial Estate, Beresford Avenue, HA0 1NW
Notes:
Hybrid planning application for the redevelopment of Northfield industrial estate:

Outline planning permission for the demolition of existing buildings and structures on the site, all site preparation works and redevelopment to provide new buildings ranging from 35.75m AOD to 111.95m AOD in height, with a total floorspace (GEA) of up to 309,400 sq m (excluding basement up to 42,000 sq m GEA) to accommodate 2,900 homes (Use Class C3),  together with new basement level including energy centre, associated storage, cycle and vehicle parking, new vehicular accesses, associated highway works to Beresford Avenue, landscaping and creation of new public and private open space, ancillary facilitating works, various temporary meanwhile uses, interim works and infrastructure.

SiteNameAddress: Oxgate Farm Works, Coles Green Road, NW2 7EY
Notes: Demolition of industrial buildings (Use class B2/B8) and erection of a three storey building providing a mixed use development comprising offices (Use class B1a) on the ground level and 9 self-contained flats (2 x 2bed, 5 x 2bed and 2 x 3bed) on the first and second floors, with associated car and cycle parking spaces, bin stores, landscaping and amenity space (as amended)  and subject to a Deed of Agreement dated 22 February 2017 under Section 106 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended.

SiteNameAddress: Peel Precinct, 97-112 Carlton House, Canterbury Terrace, 8-1, Neville Close, NW6
OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority
Notes:
Hybrid Application for the proposed redevelopment of the Peel site comprising Peel Precinct, 97-112 Carlton House, 8-14 Neville Close, 2 Canterbury Road & Peel site garages:

 Full planning application for the demolition of 2A Canterbury Road, 1-7 and 15-33 Peel Precinct and 8-14 Neville Close, and erection of four buildings (A, B, C and E) ranging between four to 16 storeys, plus part basement comprising of 38 replacement affordable homes for existing South Kilburn secure tenants, 64 private sale units (38 x 1-bed, 47 x 2-bed, 13 x 3-bed and 4 x 4-bed units) , associated landscaping, highways and public realm improvements (including new public space), private open space, associated car parking, cycle parking and servicing provision.

 Outline planning application with reserved matters (around Appearance, Landscaping, and Scale) for the demolition of 97-112 Carlton House, 34-57 Peel Precinct and Peel site garages, and erection of three buildings (D, F and G) ranging in height between up to 4 and up to 8 storeys provide up to 124 residential units comprising of 4 Affordable Housing units, and up to 120 private units, with associated landscaping, private open space, and cycle parking.

And subject to a Deed of Agreement under Section 106 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended

SiteNameAddress: Studio Flats, 117 & Rear Of 117, Kenton Road, HA3 0AZ
